title: Create-A-Ride
description: Create-a-Ride is just like a dress up game, but this time, its for your car - and there's nothing more awesome that that! Give your car your dream paint job, add decals, soup it up with different parts, you can even make custom plates! When you're done, take it out in different scenarios to see your creation in action. This ride is yours to customize, so let your creativity run wild in Create-a-Ride.
